title: (x) The Sparkle Box - Tuscan Ornate (Main Strike/Romantiques/JF Ringmaster {Mike Y, Mike F}
content:
The typeface is called Tuscan Ornate in the Mac McGrew book (p. 344) Other names are Bracelet (in Solotype Catalog), Romantiques no. 5 and Ornate No. 5.   
   
Font Mesa has digitized this as 'Main Strike'.
author: bowfinpw

comments.content:
A better digitization, in my opinion, is Dieter Steffmann's [Romantiques](http://web.archive.org/web/20051128223742/http:/www.moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/steffmann/samples/r/romantiques.htm).   
   
Another is Bracelet New by Douglas Day, but I can't seem to find that any more.

And yet another, [JF Ringmaster](http://web.archive.org/web/20051128223742/http:/www.moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/jfs/jester.htm). This one is not as well done,   
but all four digitizations are different.
